messages.body: Good morning. We'd like to place our usual monthly order — KNM Coffee, same as last month.
Good morning. I have November on file — 5 bags to Changi Hospital Wars 24 Singapore 700339. Same for December?
Yes. Same quantity, same address. We've been doing 5 bags a month for a while.
5 bags at $25, $125. Delivery date?
December 3. Same receiving — Gate A, +65 8765 4321 Stores.
We're thinking of adding tea and maybe paper from you from January. Do you do a combined discount for multiple lines?
We do. For multi-line orders we often apply a percentage off the total. When you have quantities we can quote.
For now we'll stick to coffee. But we'd like a standing discount for the 5 bags per month. We're in for the long term.
For a standing commitment we can do 5% — $23.75 per bag, $118.75 per order. We'd want at least three months.
Could we get 6% if we commit to 12 months? We might also increase to 6 bags from January for a new ward.
For 12 months we can do 6% — $23.50 per bag. That would apply to 5 or 6 bags per order under the same arrangement.
We'll take 6% from this December order. We'll sign something if you send a short letter.
We'll send a confirmation letter. December: 5 bags at $23.50 = $117.50. PO?
PO-2024-12-202. Net 30 from delivery. Invoice to accounts@hospital.sg.
We had one bag damaged in October — corner of the bag. We didn't claim. Can you reinforce packaging a bit?
Noted. I'll add a note for the warehouse. If it happens again please report and we'll replace.
For January we might need 6 bags. Same address. Would the 6% apply?
Yes. Once the letter is signed, 6 bags would be $141 at $23.50 each.
SO-2024-1205 for December — 5 bags, Dec 3, Changi. I'll send the letter by Friday.
Our legal might have small comments on the letter. Is that okay?
Yes. Send comments and we'll revise.
We're also considering sanitizer for the new ward. What's your min order?
Sanitizer 500ml is $8/bottle, minimum 24 bottles.
We're not ordering it this month. Just checking for later.
No problem. When you're ready we can add it to a future delivery.
So December is just 5 bags coffee, Dec 3, Changi. Nothing else.
Correct. Same specs — 1kg bags, one carton of 5.
Delivery note on the day as usual?
Yes. We'll send it electronically.
When will the 12-month letter arrive? We want to get it signed before year-end.
By Friday. It'll state 6% off for orders of 5+ bags per month for 12 months.
If we go to 6 bags in January do we need to amend the letter?
We can word it as 5–8 bags per month so you have flexibility without amending.
Good. Thanks. That's all for this order.
Do we need to sign the letter and send it back or is an email acceptance enough?
A signed copy is better for our files. We can also accept an email from your procurement lead confirming the terms.
We'll get it signed. Might take a week.
If we skip a month — say we have too much stock in February — does that break the 12-month deal?
We'd need to clarify in the letter. Usually we allow one skip in 12 months if you give notice. We can put that in.
We probably won't skip. Just wanted to know.
The damaged bag in October — was that from a specific batch? We logged it internally.
I don't have the batch number to hand. We can check if you need it for your records.
Not critical. Just checking. December order is the priority.
Can you send the letter to legal@hospital.sg as well? They need to review before we sign.
We'll send the letter to you and you can forward, or we can cc legal if you give the address.
We'll forward. Thanks.
That's everything. We'll confirm when the SO is received and when the letter is signed.
If we add hand sanitizer to a future order can it come on the same truck as the coffee?
Yes. Multi-line orders ship together to the same address.
We're not adding it yet. Maybe from February.
The 6% — does it apply to decaf too if we ever order that?
We'd need to confirm. Decaf is a different SKU; standing discount might or might not apply. We can add it to the letter if you want.
We'll stick to regular for now. Just curious.
No problem.
Thanks again. Bye.
